Package it.unicam.cs.formula1.GameEngine

Interface GameEngine

All Known Implementing Classes:
DefaultGameEngine
public interface GameEngine
Represents the game engine responsible for managing the game. Provides methods to load the game, start the race, update the race status, and retrieve track and bot information.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    boolean
    allBotsEliminated()
    Checks that all the bots in the competition have been eliminated.
    void
    displayStatus()
    Displays the current status of the race, including the positions of all bots.
    List<Bot>
    getBots()
    Returns the list of bots participating in the game.
    Track
    getTrack()
    Returns the track on which the game is being played.
    Bot
    getWinner()
    Return the winning bot of the race
    Boolean
    isRaceOver()
    Checks if the race is over.
    void
    startRace()
    Starts the race and manages the game loop until the race is over.
    void
    updateRace()
    Updates the race status, typically by calculating the next moves for all bots.

  • Method Details

    • startRace

      void startRace()
      Starts the race and manages the game loop until the race is over.

    • isRaceOver

      Boolean isRaceOver()
      Checks if the race is over.
      Returns:
      true if the race is over, false otherwise

    • allBotsEliminated

      boolean allBotsEliminated()
      Checks that all the bots in the competition have been eliminated.
      Returns:
      true if all bots have been eliminated, false otherwise

    • updateRace

      void updateRace()
      Updates the race status, typically by calculating the next moves for all bots. ALso eliminates bots that have crashed during the race.

    • displayStatus

      void displayStatus()
      Displays the current status of the race, including the positions of all bots.

    • getWinner

      Bot getWinner()
      Return the winning bot of the race
      Returns:
      the winning bot

    • getTrack

      Track getTrack()
      Returns the track on which the game is being played.
      Returns:
      the track

    • getBots

      List<Bot> getBots()
      Returns the list of bots participating in the game.
      Returns:
      the list of bots
